title: Ouch!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100123035743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/weekends_4371.jpg)
  
1975 type head for a feature about 1966, sweet. I might have to figure out just how squooshedâ„¢ that Bauhaus is.

I'm not entirely sure how appropriate Helvetica Condensed is for a London street nameplate from '66 either.
author: Richard Hards
